functions.name: etcd_client_cert_auth
functions.description: Checks if client certificate authentication is enabled for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_no_auto_tls
functions.description: Checks if auto TLS is disabled for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_no_peer_auto_tls
functions.description: Checks if peer auto TLS is disabled for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_peer_client_cert_auth
functions.description: Checks if peer client certificate authentication is enabled for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_peer_tls_config
functions.description: Checks if peer TLS configuration is set for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_tls_encryption
functions.description: Checks if TLS encryption is enabled for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_unique_ca
functions.description: Checks if a unique CA is used for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_pod_spec_file_permissions
functions.description: Checks pod spec file permissions for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_pod_spec_file_ownership
functions.description: Checks pod spec file ownership for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_data_directory_permissions_check
functions.description: Checks data directory permissions for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_data_directory_ownership_check
functions.description: Checks data directory ownership for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_certfile_and_keyfile_set
functions.description: Checks if certfile and keyfile are set for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_cert_file_and_key_file_set
functions.description: Checks if cert file and key file are set for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_peer_cert_file_set
functions.description: Checks if peer cert file is set for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_peer_key_file_set
functions.description: Checks if peer key file is set for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_conf_file_permissions_check
functions.description: Checks config file permissions for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_conf_file_ownership_check
functions.description: Checks config file ownership for etcd.

functions.name: etcd_wal_dir_argument_check
functions.description: Checks WAL directory argument for etcd.

notes: All functions are based on Kubernetes ETCD API.
Ensure proper RBAC permissions are configured.
etcd is the Kubernetes data store.
TLS configuration and authentication are critical.
Backup and recovery procedures should be implemented.
